channel.title: 3rd Year :: Archidemy
channel.description: A structured overview of courses for 3rd Year studens

item.title: BIM - Building Information Modeling
item.author: yaniv@hatiel.com (Yaniv Hatiel)
item.description: Essential training on BIM concepts and their implementation in architectural practice using Revit.

item.title: Bio-Climate Design
item.author: yaniv@hatiel.com (Yaniv Hatiel)
item.description: The Bio-Climate Design Course teaches students to design environmentally responsive buildings by integrating sustainable strategies, optimizing energy efficiency, and incorporating renewable solutions for functional and sustainable architecture.
